meanings.definition: One of three equal parts of a whole.
meanings.sent1: In the game, each player takes a turn to roll the dice and move their piece one third of the way around the board.
meanings.sent2: She ate a third of the pizza, leaving the rest for her friends to share.
meanings.sent3: The third slice of cake was calling my name, but I resisted the temptation.
meanings.sent4: His third attempt at solving the puzzle finally paid off, and he felt a sense of accomplishment.
meanings.sent5: The third star from the left in the night sky always reminds me of my childhood home.

meanings.definition: The ordinal number corresponding to three in a series.
meanings.sent1: She finished in third place in the race, just behind the two fastest runners.
meanings.sent2: The third book in the series was the most exciting one yet.
meanings.sent3: He jokingly claimed to be the third tallest person in the room, even though he was clearly the shortest.
meanings.sent4: The third time's the charm, as they say, and he finally succeeded on his third attempt.
meanings.sent5: The third chapter of the book revealed a surprising plot twist that kept readers on the edge of their seats.

meanings.definition: The third forward gear in a vehicle.
meanings.sent1: When driving uphill, it's best to shift into third gear for more power.
meanings.sent2: He accelerated quickly after shifting into third gear on the straight road.
meanings.sent3: The car's engine roared as he pushed the pedal to switch into third gear, feeling the rush of speed.
meanings.sent4: In the race, he strategically downshifted into third gear to navigate the sharp turn with precision.
meanings.sent5: The engine hummed smoothly as he smoothly transitioned from second to third gear, enjoying the seamless ride.
